title: God Gave Me You (A Rhyming Picture Book For Young Children And Their Parents)
features: The heavens have billions of stars,The earth has oceans of blue,I must have done something right,Because God gave me you.God Gave Me You is a beautifully illustrated picture book for young children. Your children will know how grateful to God you are for them when you read this book together. The simple, rhyming text makes for calm, soothing bedtime reading, and your little ones will fall asleep knowing that they are valued and loved.By bestselling author Cindy Bracken
description: Thank you for taking a look at one of my favorites,
I hope you enjoy it with your little one tonight, and your child will fall asleep knowing how much they are truly loved.  Thank you for supporting indie authors!  Happy Reading!- Cindy

"I love the pictures and the rhyming in this book. Easy words. And when I pause for kids to fill... they just say "god gave me you." We're not even Christian but we can appreciate the color and sound of it.""This is the perfect book to share with young children to show they are appreciated. The story rhymes which makes it even better. This book is about nature and love and it is really cute." -By Rebecca of Amazon HALL OF FAME-"This is my daughter's ultimate favorite book. Every time I read it to her she will ask me to read it to her several times. She also likes to say the words along with me." -By Damaris Saxton -"My children love reading this book, and looking at the pictures, they will even pull it up themselves and look at it until I can come read it to them." -By S.Ellis-"The rhymes and pictures are perfect! It teaches that of all the wonders of the universe, they are the most beautiful and loved!" -By rosa_azul98
, June 29, 2013 By Ana Egna - See all my reviews
This review is from: God Gave Me You (A Rhyming Picture Book For Young Children And Their Parents) (Kindle Edition)
This book has the power to make you very grateful for your child no matter what's going on in your life!
